description:
Kangaroo is a SQL client and admin tool.

Kangaroo is a AI-powered SQL client and admin tool for popular databases(MariaDB / MongoDB / MySQL / Oracle / PostgreSQL / Redis / SQLite / SQLServer / ...) on Windows / MacOS / Linux, support table design, query, model, sync, export/import etc, focus on comfortable, fun and developer friendly.
New features & bug-fixes
- MongoDB: Implement the logic of view designer
- MongoDB: Implement the logic of find builder dialog
- MongoDB: Implement the logic of find aggregation dialog
- MongoDB: Implement explain command support
- MongoDB: add aggregation file support
- MongoDB: add function designer support
- MongoDB: add role designer support
- MongoDB: add user designer support
- MongoDB: layout and cache support
- MongoDB: User/role/function delete support
- File panel append file action support
- Content: add column position support
- Update Chinese translation(zh-CN/zh-SG/zh-Hans/zh-Hant)
- Update library version (GTK 4.20.3 / libadwaita 1.8.2)
- Refactor the page with AdwPreferencesPage
- Fixed: can't save layout setting
- Fixed: SQL builder entity name with dot issue
- Fixed: privilege designer action issue
- Fixed: workspace layout setting file size increase infinitely
- Fixed: console warn messages
